name: MIR-1K (Lyrics ASR)
description: Mandarin and English karaoke singing speech corpus for lyrics transcription with vocal accompaniment removed.

metrics.name: wer
metrics.definition: Word Error Rate on lyric transcripts

test_method: Apply lyric-aligned decoding; remove musical symbols prior to scoring. Most works perform uppercase normalization.
notes: Explicitly mention beat-synchronous segmentation or chunking settings when comparing scores.
